chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
B: Set
A: Set
lt: Rel A
R: Rel B
wfgt: well_founded lt
declt: DecRel A lt
wR: WR B R

Goal:
forall bs : list B, GRBar B R bs -> forall us : list (A * B), bs = sndL us -> MinD us -> GBarlR us

Premises:
MinD = Min (A * B) (fun p q : A * B => lt (fst p) (fst q)) (ProdRel A B leq R) : list (A * B) -> Set Arguments MinD _%list_scope
sndL = map (fun p : A * B => snd p) : list (A * B) -> list B Arguments sndL _%list_scope
WR : forall A : Set, Rel A -> Set
well_founded : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> Prop
GBarlR = GRBar (A * B) (ProdRel A B leq R) : list (A * B) -> Set Arguments GBarlR _%list_scope
DecRel : forall A : Set, Rel A -> Set
Rel = fun A : Set => A -> A -> Prop : Set -> Type Arguments Rel _%type_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
GRBar : forall A : Set, Rel A -> list A -> Set
lem1aux : forall l : list B, GoodR B R l -> forall us : list (A * B), l = sndL us -> MinD us -> GBarlR us
lem1 : forall us : list (A * B), GoodR B R (sndL us) -> MinD us -> GBarlR us
subRelGRBar : forall (A B : Set) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> (forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a}) -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l -> GRBar B S (map f l)
monGRBarAux : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (l : list A), GRBar A R l -> forall xs bs cs : list A, l = xs ++ cs -> GRBar A R (xs ++ bs ++ cs)
lem0 : forall (l : list (A * B)) (a : A * B), ExistsL B (fun x : B => R x (snd a)) (sndL l) -> MinD l -> GBarlR (a :: l)
monGRBar : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (xs bs cs : list A), GRBar A R (xs ++ cs) -> GRBar A R (xs ++ bs ++ cs)
monGoodR1 : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (xs bs : list A), GoodR A R bs -> GoodR A R (xs ++ bs)
wf_inverse_rel : forall (A B : Type) (R : B -> B -> Prop) (F : A -> B -> Prop), well_founded R -> well_founded (fun x y : A => exists2 b : B, F x b & forall c : B, F y c -> R b c)
well_founded_induction_type_2 : forall (A B : Type) (R : A * B -> A * B -> Prop) (P : A -> B -> Type), well_founded R -> (forall (x : A) (x' : B), (forall (y : A) (y' : B), R (y, y') (x, x') -> P y y') -> P x x') -> forall (a : A) (b : B), P a b
subRelGoodR : forall (A B : Set) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> GoodR B S (map f l)
ProdRel : forall A B : Set, Rel A -> Rel B -> A * B -> A * B -> Prop
Acc_inverse_rel : forall (A B : Type) (R : B -> B -> Prop) (F : A -> B -> Prop) (b : B), Acc R b -> forall x : A, F x b -> Acc (fun x0 y : A => exists2 b0 : B, F x0 b0 & forall c : B, F y c -> R b0 c) x
wf_inverse_image : forall (A B : Type) (R : B -> B -> Prop) (f : A -> B), well_founded R -> well_founded (fun x y : A => R (f x) (f y))
Fix_F_2 : forall (A B : Type) (R : A * B -> A * B -> Prop) (P : A -> B -> Type), (forall (x : A) (x' : B), (forall (y : A) (y' : B), R (y, y') (x, x') -> P y y') -> P x x') -> forall (x : A) (x' : B), Acc R (x, x') -> P x x'
monGoodR : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (xs bs cs : list A), GoodR A R (xs ++ bs) -> GoodR A R (xs ++ cs ++ bs)
subPredExistsL : forall (A B : Set) (P : Pred A) (S : Pred B) (f : A -> B), (forall a : A, P a -> S (f a)) -> forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> ExistsL B S (map f l)
OpenInd : forall (A : Set) (lt R : Rel A), well_founded lt -> forall xs : list A, Min A lt R xs -> (forall a : A, Min A lt R (a :: xs) -> GRBar A R (a :: xs)) -> GRBar A R xs
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
monExistsL : forall (A : Set) (P : Pred A) (xs bs cs : list A), ExistsL A P (xs ++ bs) -> ExistsL A P (xs ++ cs ++ bs)
Acc_inverse_image : forall (A B : Type) (R : B -> B -> Prop) (f : A -> B) (x : A), Acc R (f x) -> Acc (fun x0 y : A => R (f x0) (f y)) x
nilGRBar : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A), GRBar A R nil -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l
consGRBar : forall (A : Set) (R : Rel A) (l : list A), GRBar A R l -> forall a : A, GRBar A R (a :: l)
Inductive prod (A B : Type) : Type := pair : A -> B -> A * B Arguments prod (_ _)%type_scope Arguments pair {A B}%type_scope
cmin : forall (A : Set) (lt R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), Min A lt R l -> (forall y : A, lt y a -> GRBar A R (y :: l)) -> Min A lt R (a :: l)
Min_ind : forall (A : Set) (lt R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, Min A lt R l -> Prop), P nil (nmin A lt R) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (m : Min A lt R l), P l m -> forall g : forall y : A, lt y a -> GRBar A R (y :: l), P (a :: l) (cmin A lt R a l m g)) -> forall (l : list A) (m : Min A lt R l), P l m
Min_rect : forall (A : Set) (lt R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, Min A lt R l -> Type), P nil (nmin A lt R) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (m : Min A lt R l), P l m -> forall g : forall y : A, lt y a -> GRBar A R (y :: l), P (a :: l) (cmin A lt R a l m g)) -> forall (l : list A) (m : Min A lt R l), P l m
Min_rec : forall (A : Set) (lt R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, Min A lt R l -> Set), P nil (nmin A lt R) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (m : Min A lt R l), P l m -> forall g : forall y : A, lt y a -> GRBar A R (y :: l), P (a :: l) (cmin A lt R a l m g)) -> forall (l : list A) (m : Min A lt R l), P l m
Min_sind : forall (A : Set) (lt R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, Min A lt R l -> SProp), P nil (nmin A lt R) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (m : Min A lt R l), P l m -> forall g : forall y : A, lt y a -> GRBar A R (y :: l), P (a :: l) (cmin A lt R a l m g)) -> forall (l : list A) (m : Min A lt R l), P l m
